ch0014_01_cheren/0101_0701_01_10:
Ah, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
Late for class again, I see. Wait, that’s not
right. Sorry, force of habit! Good to see you!
ch0014_01_cheren/0101_0701_02_10:
I’ve been studying every day in hopes of
being able to support you better in battle.
ch0014_01_cheren/0601_0701_01_10: My Pokémon Stoutland, Cinccino, and Watchog...
ch0014_01_cheren/0601_0701_02_10:
are all fans of being groomed and
getting massages.
ch0014_01_cheren/0601_0701_03_10:
They’re always happy to get a nice massage
right after a tough battle.
ch0014_01_cheren/0601_0702_01_10:
Rewarding your hardworking Pokémon and
looking after their well-being is...
ch0014_01_cheren/0601_0702_02_10:
one of the most important jobs we have
as Trainers.
ch0014_01_cheren/0602_0701_01_10:
After I became a Gym Leader, the Lillipup
I’d raised as my partner evolved into
a Stoutland.
ch0014_01_cheren/0602_0701_02_10: I haven’t been a Gym Leader for very long yet...
ch0014_01_cheren/0602_0701_03_10:
but I will say this: the trust and friendship
that I’ve built up with Stoutland is
second to none.
ch0014_01_cheren/0602_0701_04_10:
Stoutland is the ace of my team,
and I depend on him a lot. I’d love to
show you how strong he is sometime.
ch0014_01_cheren/0602_0702_01_10:
The key to bringing out a Pokémon’s full
strength is getting to know it inside and out.
ch0014_01_cheren/0602_0702_02_10:
I did a ton of studying with my Stoutland
here, at first.
ch0014_01_cheren/0602_0702_03_10:
And not just reading books, mind you.
A lot of it was observation. It’s important to
learn what sort of personality your Pokémon has.
ch0014_01_cheren/0603_0701_01_10:
My job at the Trainers’ School is to teach
young Trainers all about Pokémon.
ch0014_01_cheren/0603_0701_02_10:
There are many different methods out there
for improving your strength as a Trainer...
ch0014_01_cheren/0603_0701_03_10:
but in my experience, hands-on learning with
Pokémon through battling is a surefire way
to get stronger.
ch0014_01_cheren/0603_0702_01_10:
I may be on the teaching end of the classroom
at the Trainers’ School, but often I’m learning
just as much as I’m teaching.
ch0014_01_cheren/0603_0702_02_10:
Sometimes beginner Trainers who aren’t
used to being around Pokémon help me discover
things I never would have noticed otherwise.
ch0014_01_cheren/0604_0701_01_10:
You know, I did a fair bit of research on
Pasio a while back.
ch0014_01_cheren/0604_0701_02_10:
I suppose it should be obvious, but
photos really don’t do justice to the
scale of this place at all.
ch0014_01_cheren/0604_0701_03_10:
It’s not enough to just read and study. You’ve
got to go out and experience the world
with your own two eyes.
ch0014_01_cheren/0604_0702_01_10:
That reminds me—I have a friend who wants to
go do some sight-seeing. I think I might
follow along.
ch0014_01_cheren/0604_0702_02_10:
Funny thing is, up until recently, I don’t think
I would have said that. The old me couldn’t
be bothered.
ch0014_01_cheren/0605_0701_01_10:
Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
If you ever get a chance to visit the
Unova region, you should come visit my Gym.
ch0014_01_cheren/0605_0701_02_10:
I’d love to introduce you to the Trainers there,
as well as my students at the Trainers’ School.
ch0014_01_cheren/0605_0701_03_10:
I’m sure they’d get a kick out of hearing
all about our adventures here on Pasio.
ch0014_01_cheren/0605_0702_01_10:
With your skills, [Name:PlayerNickname ],
I’m sure you could make a career for yourself
as a Trainer anywhere you go.
ch0014_01_cheren/0605_0702_02_10:
I’m not just saying that, either.
I believe it.
ch0014_01_cheren/0605_0702_03_10:
I want to battle you out in the world—not
just with my Stoutland here but with the
Pokémon I meet along the road.
ch0014_01_cheren/1701_0701_01_10:
Nice timing!
Could you hang on a second?
ch0014_01_cheren/1701_0701_02_10:
I wanted to give this to you!
I thought it seemed rather useful.
Hope it comes in handy.
ch0014_01_cheren/1701_0702_01_10:
If I come across anything else that seems
useful, I’ll make sure I pass it along to you.
ch0014_01_cheren/2501_0701_01_10:
Hmm. I wonder what kind of battle strategies
we could utilize with your Pokémon and mine.
ch0014_01_cheren/2501_0701_02_10:
Oops, sorry about that.
Sometimes I get lost in my thoughts.
ch0014_01_cheren/2501_0701_03_10:
Being both a Gym Leader and a teacher,
I tend to have a lot on my mind
at any given time.
ch0014_01_cheren/2501_0702_01_10:
You know, I’ve always preferred to pause and
give things a lot of thought.
ch0014_01_cheren/2501_0702_02_10:
If you brainstorm your battle strategies
beforehand, you’ll be able to quickly adapt
to any obstacle you face later on.
ch0014_01_cheren/2501_0702_03_10:
However, just because that method works for
me doesn’t necessarily mean it’s best for you.
ch0014_01_cheren/2501_0702_04_10:
Everyone should be free to seek out
whatever battle methods work best for them.
ch0014_01_cheren/2511_0701_01_10:
It’s exciting to think about what the future
holds for you and the Pokémon you’ll
meet on your path as a Trainer.
ch0014_01_cheren/2511_0701_02_10:
There are so many diverse people to meet here
around every corner, each with their own
unique thoughts and feelings.
ch0014_01_cheren/2511_0701_03_10:
I mean, I came all this way because I wanted
to have those same experiences as well.
ch0014_01_cheren/2511_0702_01_10:
I’ve gone through a lot to get where I am today,
both good and bad.
ch0014_01_cheren/2511_0702_02_10:
But honestly, going off on my own as a Trainer
and traveling throughout the Unova region
was the best thing that ever happened to me.
ch0014_01_cheren/2511_0702_03_10:
I hope that one day you feel the same about
the experiences you’re having right here
and right now.
ch0014_01_cheren/3001_0701_01_10:
Morning! Did you get plenty of rest last night?
We’re gonna need our energy today.
ch0014_01_cheren/3002_0701_01_10:
Morning! There are only so many hours in a day.
You should set up a game plan!
ch0014_01_cheren/3003_0701_01_10:
Afternoon! It’s the perfect time for studying.
You should take advantage of it!
ch0014_01_cheren/3004_0701_01_10:
Afternoon! Now’s the perfect time to go out
and do something fun!
ch0014_01_cheren/3005_0701_01_10:
Evening! Anything left on your to-do list?
The day’s almost over.
ch0014_01_cheren/3006_0701_01_10:
Evening! It’s pretty dark outside, so we should be
careful if we’re heading out.
